bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Design Tests for High-Voltage (&#x003E;1000 V) Fuses and Accessories Corrigenda 1
IEEE Standard Design Tests for High-Voltage (&#x003E;1000 V) Fuses and Accessories Corrigenda 1
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C37.41-2016/Cor 1-2017 (Corrigenda to IEEE Std C37.41-2016)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Corrigenda concerning required procedures for performing design tests for high-voltage fuses are specified. These design tests, are appropriate to expulsion fuses, and cover interrupting tests and fuses using polymeric insulators.

Corrigenda concerning required procedures for performing design tests for high-voltage fuses are specified. These design tests, are appropriate to expulsion fuses, and cover interrupting tests and fuses using polymeric insulators.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibitem.formattedref: IEEE Std C37.41-2016 (Revision of IEEE Std C37.41-2008)
